ygData.subject: RE: Fw: Argh! A ticked cleric...
ygData.msgSnippet: again i need to state i am not doing any of the cleric s quests from Ro...........i refuse to sit and wait when i can be lvl ing.....and the stats suck !!!!! i
ygData.messageBody:
again i need to state i am not doing any of the cleric's quests from
Ro...........i refuse to sit and wait when i can be lvl'ing.....and the
stats suck !!!!! i am a druid as well and am glad they upped the track but,
as a cleric i would have liked to see smoe changes on our armor...this is
rediculas and getting worse by the minute =0(
Topaaz SpellBinder
Xegony....


>From: jmiller@... (Justin Miller)
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Fw: Argh! A ticked cleric...
>Date: Thu, 20 Jan 2000 11:39:13 -0800
>
>From: jmiller@... (Justin Miller)
>
>I agree completely!
>
>
><begin rant>
>I have obtained everything but the gloves and chestplate (two of the
>hardest
>pieces probably). Wow, I mean they really give Everquest a great name! I
>get to sit in Befallen for hours, and hours killing waiting for a lucky
>roll
>of the dice. After I'm done, I get to go over to Dagnors Cauldron, and
>compete with every druid on the server for Bilge, this is a great set of
>quests! I can't believe with all the changes, that once again the cleric
>was over looked. For christs sake the druid got his tracking raised! Oh
>sorry, those poor druids help em out some more, they aren't getting enough!
><end rant>
>
>Justin
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeff Portwine [mailto:jdport@...]
> Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 10:47 AM
> To: eq-clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Fw: Argh! A ticked cleric...
>
>
> From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>
>
> Warning... a serious rant follows:
>
> [Rant begins]
>
> I just read the patch notes for the new patch and I must say I am
>EXTREMELY displeased. I've been hearing rumors for a couple of weeks from
>many different sources that this new patch was going to improve the
>situations clerics have with the HORRIBLE camps the have to do to get their
>armor. Well, this patch seems to have enhancements for just about
>everyone
>except clerics. Not one single thing in it to effect clerics. Even the
>armor of Ro, they say they are chaning it to increase the drops. That is
>just BS. I will be the first to admit that the paladin armor quests are
>hard. They are very very hard. But they aren't hard becasue of the rarity
>of drops!!!! Most of their stuff drops relatively often... though it is
>hard to get (i.e. the caudrons in mistmoore). How many days now have I
>been camping that freaking Aviak in the OOT??? Just about every cleric
>i've
>talked to who is trying to get that, has been camping it for like 2 months
>and not gotten it. Those who have gotten it say it took them about 2
>months. What's worse is that I still have 3 or 4 camps to do that are as
>bad or worse. This is absolutely absurd. People like me with jobs and
>lives outside of EQ cannot possibly do these quests and it just pisses me
>off to no end. I had thought that there was going to be some relief with
>his patch... maybe there will be and it just wasn't documented... but
>seeing
>as how they documented enhancements for just about every single other
>person
>in norrath I really doubt it. I guess all the feedbacks from every
>cleric
>in Norrath just doesn't matter to Verant.
>
> [rant done]
>
> Heh.. well i won't stop trying for the armor.. i'm determined to get it
>which makes me wonder about my own sanity since i probably won't even wear
>it in most situations. I just want it for pride.. and it will make
>something very nice to wear to events like weddings and stuff. Though
>it'll be months and months before i have it anyway...
>
> -Eachann
>
